en-US.title: Equality Clinic of Augusta
en-US.description: The Equality Clinic of Augusta offers free HIV testing and Pre-Exposure Prophylaxis (PrEP) for HIV. It's a volunteer-driven organization providing healthcare services specifically for the underserved LGBTQIA+ community in the Augusta region. It offers tailored, inclusive, and sensitive care for people of all identities, including transgender, non-binary, transmasculine, and transfeminine individuals.
